name: Ext_R4B_Consent_pr_class
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Consent.provision.class for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.provision.class from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: e.g. Resource Type, Profile, CDA, etc.
element.definition: The class of information covered by this rule. The type can be a FHIR resource type, a profile on a type, or a CDA document, or some other type that indicates what sort of information the consent relates to.
element.comment: `Consent.provision.class` maps to R5 `Consent.provision.documentType`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.provision.resourceType`, `Consent.provision.documentType`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Consent.provision.class` maps to R5 `Consent.provision.resourceType`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.provision.resourceType`, `Consent.provision.documentType`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: e.g. Resource Type, Profile, CDA, etc.
element.definition: The class of information covered by this rule. The type can be a FHIR resource type, a profile on a type, or a CDA document, or some other type that indicates what sort of information the consent relates to.
element.comment: `Consent.provision.class` maps to R5 `Consent.provision.documentType`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.provision.resourceType`, `Consent.provision.documentType`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Consent.provision.class` maps to R5 `Consent.provision.resourceType`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.provision.resourceType`, `Consent.provision.documentType`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The class (type) of information a consent rule covers.
